description: Unit of measurement for reach and audience size metrics. Different channels and measurement providers count reach in fundamentally different units, making cross-channel comparison impossible without declaring the unit.

enumDescriptions.custom: Publisher-defined reach unit. Describe in ext.
enumDescriptions.devices: Unique device identifiers (IDFA, GAID, CTV device ID).
enumDescriptions.individuals: Unique people. Panel-based or identity-resolved measurement.

title: Reach Unit
